name: Seagazer
description:
I made this game in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 38 Compo. The theme was A Small World.

In my brainstorming process I found myself watching a video of a starry night in timelapse. Looking out on the universe from this tiny rock certainly makes me feel small, so I decided I would make a game about stars in the sky. 48 hours later, here it is.

I hope you enjoy playing. And if you don't really get what to do, I hope you had a nice time watching the stars!

The design, "art", sound are all by me.
